admin_create_user.subject: Welcome! Get started with ChargeBot by Sust.
admin_create_user.text: Welcome to Sust. To get started using the ChargeBot app, click the button below to set your new password.
admin_create_user.need_help: Need help? Reach out any time at hello@sust.pro for assistance.
admin_create_user.footer: @2024 Copyrights. All rights reserved by Sust
admin_create_user.sms_message: Welcome to Sust. Click the link to activate your account.

forgot_password.subject: Reset your ChargeBot password
forgot_password.text: Hi! We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to set your new password. You’ll be prompted to provide the code below in order to set a new password.
forgot_password.disregard: If you did not request to change your password, you can disregard this email.
forgot_password.need_help: Need help? Reach out any time at hello@sust.pro for assistance.
forgot_password.footer: @2024 Copyrights. All rights reserved by Sust
forgot_password.sms_message: We received a request to reset your Sust password. Click the link to set your new password. Your reset code is {####}

battery_low.title: Battery Low
battery_low.message: ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" battery is at {{{state_of_charge}}}% and may soon require charging.

battery_critical.title: Battery Critical
battery_critical.message: ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" has a critically low battery and will be unable to charge more equipment until plugged into a power source.

battery_temperature_low.title: Battery Temperature Low
battery_temperature_low.message: ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" temperature is currently at {{{temperature_f}}}°F, charge performance may be reduced. To protect your battery, turn off the battery breaker while temperatures are below 32°F.

battery_temperature_critical.title: Battery Freeze
battery_temperature_critical.message: ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" temperature is currently at {{{temperature_f}}}°F. Risk of battery freeze! Disconnect your battery and move it to a warmer space to prevent permanent damage!

battery_temperature_normalized.title: Battery Temperature Normal
battery_temperature_normalized.message: ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" temperature is currently at {{{temperature_f}}}°F, charge performance restored.

battery_charging.title: Battery Charging
battery_charging.message: ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is now charging. The battery is at {{{state_of_charge}}}%.

battery_discharging.title: Battery Discharging
battery_discharging.messageFull: ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is done charging and your battery is at full capacity.
battery_discharging.messageNotFull: ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is no longer charging and the battery is at {{{state_of_charge}}}%. If you did not stop charging, check to make sure there is not a connection problem.

gps_arrive_home.title: Arrived Home
gps_arrive_home.message: ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" has arrived home. Please make sure you plug it in to charge.

gps_leave_home.title: Left Home
gps_leave_home.message: ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" has left home. You can track location from your App.

gps_long_stop.title: Long Stop
gps_long_stop.message: ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" has been at {{{address}}} for more than {{{parked_time_hours}}} hours.

not_plugged_in.title: Not Plugged In
not_plugged_in.message: ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is not charging from utility power. It may not be plugged in or a site breaker may have tripped. Please check to ensure no issues tomorrow.

nothing_charging.title: Nothing Charging
nothing_charging.message: Since arriving home, the ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" has not charged any batteries. Please check and make sure your equipment is plugged in.

daily_usage.title: Daily Usage
daily_usage.message: Since 12am today, your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" has charged {{{energy_kwh}}}Kwh worth of batteries.

absent_equipment.title: Equipment Left Behind
absent_equipment.message: You forgot to load "{{{equipment}}}" at "{{{address}}}". Please return to pick it up.

all_equipments_present.title: All Equipment Loaded
all_equipments_present.message: You successfully loaded all equipment before leaving the last location.

not_plugged_in.name: Not Plugged In
not_plugged_in.description: You will receive a notification at the scheduled time if the ChargeBot is not plugged into grid power. This event will be triggered every day of the week at the scheduled time.

battery_low.name: Battery Low
battery_low.description: You will receive a notification if the ChargeBot battery drops below 12%.

arrive_home.name: Arrive Home
arrive_home.description: You will receive a notification when the ChargeBot arrives at it's home location.

leave_home.name: Leave Home
leave_home.description: You will receive a notification when the ChargeBot leaves it's home location.

long_stop.name: Long Stop
long_stop.description: You will receive a notification when the ChargeBot remains at a location for more than 4 hours. This does not include the home location.

daily_use.name: Daily Use
daily_use.description: You will receive a daily notification at the scheduled time about ChargeBot use for the day. This event will be triggered every day of the week at the scheduled time.

nothing_charging.name: Nothing Charging
nothing_charging.description: You will receive a notification at the scheduled time if there are no devices charging on the ChargeBot. This event will be triggered every day of the week at the scheduled time.

iot_connection.title: Internet Error
iot_connection.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is not connected to internet.

iot_subscribe.title: Config Error
iot_subscribe.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is having issues connecting cloud services. Please contact support.

iot_unsubscribe.title: Config Error
iot_unsubscribe.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is having issues connecting cloud services. Please contact support.

iot_publish.title: Config Error
iot_publish.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is having issues connecting cloud services. Please contact support.

system_usage_cpu.title: High CPU Usage
system_usage_cpu.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" experiencing high CPU usage. Please contact support if the problem persists.

system_usage_temperature.title: High Temperature
system_usage_temperature.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" experiencing high temperature. Please contact support if the problem persists.

system_usage_undervoltage.title: Undervoltage
system_usage_undervoltage.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" experiencing low voltage. Please contact support if the problem persists.

system_usage_low_volt_core.title: Undervoltage
system_usage_low_volt_core.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" experiencing low voltage. Please contact support if the problem persists.

system_usage_memory.title: High Memory Usage
system_usage_memory.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" experiencing high memory usage. Please contact support if the problem persists.

system_usage_disk.title: High Disk Usage
system_usage_disk.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is running out of disk space. Please contact support.

connection_error.title: Connection Error
connection_error.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" battery is not present. It may not be plugged in.

connection_error.title: Connection Error
connection_error.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" PDU is not present. It may be off or not be plugged in.

command_error_start_priority_charge.title: Start Priority Charge Failed
command_error_start_priority_charge.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" could not start a priority charge.

command_error_stop_priority_charge.title: Stop Priority Charge Failed
command_error_stop_priority_charge.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" could not stop a priority charge.

command_error_set_schedule.title: Set Grid Charging Schedule Failed
command_error_set_schedule.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" could not setup grid charging schedule.

connection_error.title: Connection Error
connection_error.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" inverter is not present. It may not be plugged in or failed

connection_error.title: Connection Error
connection_error.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" GPS is not present. It may not be plugged in or failed.

connection_error.title: Connection Error
connection_error.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" temperature sensor is not present. It may not be plugged in or failed.

connection_error.title: Connection Error
connection_error.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" fans are not present. It may not be plugged in or failed.
